Periscope Data | San Francisco, ONSITE | Full Stack Engineer (Ruby, Go, CoffeeScript, Java) | https://www.periscopedata.com/

Periscope is a data analysis tool for data analysts that allows them to type SQL queries and get charts really, really fast. Revenue has doubled twice in the last 6 months. We have gone from jumpstarting our car to hanging on as the car races up the hill. - In your first day you'll ship new code to production.

    - In your first week you'll ship at least one customer-facing feature.

    - In your first month you'll write code at every level of the stack.

    - In your first 6 months you'll rebuild a major piece of the Periscope stack.
We're growing, fast We were twenty people in February and thirty in March. Join our team of 5 engineers! hello@periscopedata.com

More info: https://www.periscopedata.com/data-obsessed-engineer
